questions.question: First order system is defined as :

answers.c: Total number of poles of equation
answers.d: Total number of poles and order of equation

explanations.a: not same as the order of differential equation
explanations.b: not same as the order of differential equation
explanations.c: not same as the order of differential equation
explanations.d: same as the order of differential equation

questions.question: The nature of transient response of a system is dependent __________.

answers.c: Both on the system poles and the inputs applied

explanations.a: to analyze transient response to standard test signals
explanations.b: does not analyze transient response to standard test signals
explanations.c: does not analyze transient response to standard test signals

questions.question: For a second order undamped system, the poles are _____.
The Laplace transform of impulse function is ________.
A second order system with damping ratio of greater than one is called____ system.
